00099 class EGS_PARALLEL_BEAM_EXPORT EGS_ParallelBeam :
00100     public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00109     EGS_ParallelBeam(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, EGS_BaseShape *Shape,
00110                      const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00111         EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), shape(Shape), uo(0,0,1) {
00112         setUp();
00113     };
00114 
00119     EGS_ParallelBeam(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00120     ~EGS_ParallelBeam() {
00121         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00122     };
00123 
00124     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00125                               EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00126         x = shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00127         u = uo;
00128         wt = 1;
00129     };
00130 
00131     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00132         return count/shape->area();
00133     };
00134 
00135     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const {
00136         return true;
00137     };
00138 
00139     bool setFluenceState(istream &) {
00140         return true;
00141     };
00142 
00143     bool isValid() const {
00144         return (s != 0 && shape != 0);
00145     };
00146 
00147 protected:
00148

00150     EGS_Vector    uo;
